data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bosco, Jennifer M., Chuang, Angela (2018): A new species of grass spider, Agelenopsis riechertii, from the Southwestern USA, with notes on its courtship behavior (Araneae: Agelenidae). Zootaxa 4442 (4): 579-583, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.4.6|1 occurrence
